verses.text: \w So|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Aman \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w again|strong="H8145"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* warm \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* thy \w petition|strong="H7596"\w*, \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* thee? \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* wilt thou \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: \w although|strong="H0559"\w* thou \w ask|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, thou shalt \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w she|strong="H0518"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* Favour \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w please|strong="H2895"\w* thee, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w ask|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w given|strong="H5650"\w* \w up|strong="H4428"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*, \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w would|strong="H8198"\w* \w God|strong="H0369"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H5650"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* bondmen \w and|strong="H4428"\w* bondwomen: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* evil might \w be|strong="H4428"\w* borne \w with|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w would|strong="H8198"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* mourned \w in|strong="H4428"\w* silence: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* enemy, \w whose|strong="H8198"\w* cruelty redoundeth upon \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Assuerus \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* power, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0559"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w*?

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w It|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* Aman \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w our|strong="H2088"\w* adversary \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w most|strong="H4428"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*. Aman hearing \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* forthwith astonished, \w not|strong="H2088"\w* being able \w to|strong="H0559"\w* bear \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w being|strong="H5315"\w* \w angry|strong="H2534"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H5975"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w garden|strong="H1594"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* trees. Aman \w also|strong="H4428"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* entreat \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* understood \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6965"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w garden|strong="H1594"\w* \w set|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* trees, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w entered|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w place|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w found|strong="H1571"\w* Aman \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* \w lay|strong="H5307"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* force \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H1571"\w* \w yet|strong="H1571"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* immediately \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w covered|strong="H2645"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Harbona|strong="H2726"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* waiting \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* gibbet \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Mardochai, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, standeth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Aman’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, being \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w high|strong="H1364"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w Hang|strong="H8518"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H0834"\w* Aman \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* gibbet, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Mardochai: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* ceased.
